page.title: 11Falkirk Tryst Cont'd
page.content: It is still an{event}today,the Tryst{ {fair}which comes to Tryst ground in September.Local people regard it as a part of their heritage.One girl wrote"Every year when the tryst comes I go there all the time.I would never miss it.I go on as many attractions as I can and stay out till late."The tryst children go to the local primary and secondary schools."When the tryst boys come into our class for two weeks they were shy,then,after a few days,they played and were just like the rest of us.They have lovely names like Rennie and Ryan and D'Aroy.I heard the council is going to allow houses to be built on tryst land.That would be a terrible thing to do.They have enough houses and children's fun would be spoil,"was one pupil's{ {attitude} to this{tradition. {
